verses.text: Let God arise, let \w his|strong="H1732"\w* enemies \w be|strong="H1732"\w* scattered; Let them \w also|strong="H1732"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* hate \w him|strong="H1732"\w* flee before \w him|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* smoke \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w driven|strong="H5127"\w* \w away|strong="H5127"\w*, \w so|strong="H6965"\w* \w drive|strong="H6327"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H5127"\w*: \w As|strong="H6440"\w* wax melteth \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire, \w So|strong="H6965"\w* let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wicked perish \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* righteous \w be|strong="H7563"\w* glad; let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* exult \w before|strong="H6440"\w* God: Yea, let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* rejoice \w with|strong="H6440"\w* gladness.

Sing \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* God, sing praises \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* name: Cast \w up|strong="H8055"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* highway \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H6662"\w* rideth through \w the|strong="H6440"\w* deserts; \w His|strong="H6440"\w* name \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w exult|strong="H5970"\w* \w ye|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* father \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fatherless, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* judge \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* widows, \w Is|strong="H8034"\w* \w God|strong="H3050"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* holy habitation.

God setteth \w the|strong="H6944"\w* solitary \w in|strong="H4583"\w* families: He bringeth out \w the|strong="H6944"\w* prisoners into prosperity; But \w the|strong="H6944"\w* rebellious dwell \w in|strong="H4583"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* parched land.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w thou|strong="H3427"\w* wentest \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H3427"\w* \w thy|strong="H3318"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*, \w When|strong="H3318"\w* \w thou|strong="H3427"\w* didst \w march|strong="H3318"\w* \w through|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* wilderness; \qs Selah\qs*

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* earth trembled, \w The|strong="H6440"\w* heavens \w also|strong="H5971"\w* dropped \add rain\add* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God: Yon Sinai \add trembled\add* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, didst send \w a|strong="H3068"\w* plentiful rain, \w Thou|strong="H6440"\w* didst confirm \w thine|strong="H6440"\w* inheritance, \w when|strong="H3478"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* weary.

\w Thy|strong="H3559"\w* congregation dwelt therein: Thou, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, didst \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w of|strong="H5159"\w* \w thy|strong="H3559"\w* goodness \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* poor.

\w The|strong="H3559"\w* Lord giveth \w the|strong="H3559"\w* word: \w The|strong="H3559"\w* women \w that|strong="H2416"\w* publish \w the|strong="H3559"\w* tidings \w are|strong="H2896"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H2896"\w* host.

Kings \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w armies|strong="H6635"\w* flee, \w they|strong="H5414"\w* flee; \w And|strong="H7227"\w* she \w that|strong="H5414"\w* tarrieth \w at|strong="H5414"\w* home divideth \w the|strong="H5414"\w* spoil.

When ye lie among \w the|strong="H2505"\w* \w sheepfolds|strong="H5116"\w*, \add It is as\add* \w the|strong="H2505"\w* wings \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dove covered \w with|strong="H1004"\w* silver, \w And|strong="H4428"\w* her pinions \w with|strong="H1004"\w* yellow gold.
\w When|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H7901"\w* Almighty scattered kings therein, \add It was as when\add* it snoweth \w in|strong="H7901"\w* Zalmon.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* mountain \w of|strong="H4428"\w* God \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6566"\w* mountain \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Bashan; \w A|strong="H3068"\w* high mountain \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6566"\w* mountain \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Bashan.

Why look ye askance, ye \w high|strong="H1386"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w At|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w which|strong="H2022"\w* God hath desired \w for|strong="H2022"\w* his abode? Yea, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H2022"\w* dwell \add in it\add* forever.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* chariots \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* twenty thousand, \w even|strong="H3068"\w* thousands \w upon|strong="H7931"\w* thousands: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w*, \add as in\add* Sinai, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sanctuary.

Thou hast ascended \w on|strong="H7393"\w* high, thou hast led away captives; Thou hast received \w gifts|strong="H6944"\w* among men, Yea, \add among\add* \w the|strong="H6944"\w* rebellious also, \w that|strong="H6944"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* God might dwell \add with them\add*.

Blessed be \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w*, who daily beareth \w our|strong="H3947"\w* burden, Even \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w God|strong="H3050"\w* who \w is|strong="H4791"\w* \w our|strong="H3947"\w* salvation. \qs Selah\qs*

God \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w unto|strong="H3117"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w deliverances|strong="H3444"\w*; \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w unto|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* Lord belongeth escape \w from|strong="H3117"\w* death.

But \w God|strong="H3069"\w* \w will|strong="H3069"\w* smite through \w the|strong="H3069"\w* head \w of|strong="H4194"\w* his enemies, \w The|strong="H3069"\w* hairy scalp \w of|strong="H4194"\w* such \w a|strong="H3068"\w* one as goeth \w on|strong="H3069"\w* still \w in|strong="H4194"\w* his guiltiness.

\w The|strong="H1980"\w* Lord said, \w I|strong="H1980"\w* will \w bring|strong="H1980"\w* again \w from|strong="H1980"\w* Bashan, \w I|strong="H1980"\w* will \w bring|strong="H1980"\w* \add them\add* again \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* depths \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* sea;

\w That|strong="H7725"\w* \w thou|strong="H7725"\w* mayest crush \add them\add*, \add dipping\add* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* foot \w in|strong="H7725"\w* blood, \w That|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* tongue \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* dogs \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H1316"\w* \w its|strong="H7725"\w* portion \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \add thine\add* enemies.

\w They|strong="H7272"\w* \w have|strong="H7272"\w* seen \w thy|strong="H4480"\w* goings, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, Even \w the|strong="H4480"\w* goings \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* God, \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w King|strong="H4616"\w*, \w into|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* sanctuary.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* singers \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w before|strong="H7200"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* minstrels followed \w after|strong="H7200"\w*, \w In|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* midst \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* damsels playing \w with|strong="H4428"\w* timbrels.

Bless ye God \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* congregations, Even \w the|strong="H8432"\w* Lord, \add ye that are\add* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H8432"\w* Israel.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* little Benjamin \w their|strong="H3068"\w* ruler, \w The|strong="H3068"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Judah \add and\add* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* council, \w The|strong="H3068"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zebulun, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Naphtali.
Thy God \w hath|strong="H3063"\w* commanded thy strength: Strengthen, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w that|strong="H3063"\w* \w which|strong="H8033"\w* thou hast wrought \w for|strong="H8033"\w* us.
Because \w of|strong="H6466"\w* \w thy|strong="H6680"\w* temple \w at|strong="H6680"\w* Jerusalem Kings \w shall|strong="H5797"\w* bring presents \w unto|strong="H6680"\w* \w thee|strong="H6680"\w*.

Rebuke \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wild beast \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* reeds, \w The|strong="H5921"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bulls, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* calves \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* peoples, Trampling \w under|strong="H5921"\w* foot \w the|strong="H5921"\w* pieces \w of|strong="H4428"\w* silver: \w He|strong="H3389"\w* \w hath|strong="H4428"\w* scattered \w the|strong="H5921"\w* peoples \w that|strong="H4428"\w* delight \w in|strong="H5921"\w* war.

Princes \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* out \w of|strong="H5971"\w* Egypt; Ethiopia \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* haste \w to|strong="H5971"\w* stretch out her hands \w unto|strong="H5971"\w* God.

Sing \w unto|strong="H4714"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, ye kingdoms \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* earth; Oh sing praises \w unto|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Lord; \qs Selah\qs*

\w To|strong="H4467"\w* him that rideth \w upon|strong="H4467"\w* \w the|strong="H2167"\w* heaven \w of|strong="H4467"\w* heavens, which \w are|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H4467"\w* old; Lo, he uttereth \w his|strong="H7891"\w* voice, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mighty voice.

\w Ascribe|strong="H5414"\w* \w ye|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*: \w His|strong="H5414"\w* excellency \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H8064"\w*, \w And|strong="H8064"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* skies.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*, \add thou art\add* terrible \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* holy places: \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w power|strong="H5797"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \add his\add* people. Blessed \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*.
